title: Diary of Steve the Noob 6
description: Follow Steve the noob as he travels with Bob and Lucky to the secret mining location. But who knows what dangers they will face on the way there? Will they ever reach their destination? Find out today by reading this next volume to the Steve the Noob series.  Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
